mapper.insert: insert into orders (od_num , mb_id , od_address , od_address1 , od_mobile , od_name , od_total , pd_idx ,od_msg , od_delivery) values (#{od_num},#{mb_id},#{od_address},#{od_address1},#{od_mobile}, #{od_name},#{od_total}, #{pd_idx},#{od_msg} , '배송준비중')
mapper.select: select o.mb_id , o.od_address, o.od_address1, o.od_mobile , o.od_total , o.od_delivery, od.pd_category, od.price , od.amount , (od.price * od.amount) summoney, od.pd_name, od.pd_img, od.pd_idx, o.od_idx , o.od_num from orders o , orders_pd od where od.pd_idx = o.pd_idx and o.mb_id =#{mb_id} and o.od_num = #{od_num} and o.od_num = od.od_num
mapper.delete: delete from cart where mb_id =#{mb_id} and pd_idx =#{pd_idx}
mapper.update: update product set pd_stock = pd_stock - (select amount from orders_pd where pd_idx = #{pd_idx} and od_num = #{od_num}) where pd_idx = #{pd_idx}
update product set pd_stock = pd_stock + (select amount from orders_pd where od_num = #{od_num} and pd_idx = #{pd_idx}) where pd_idx = #{pd_idx}
mapper.insert: insert into preorder (mb_id , cart_idx , pd_idx, pd_category, pd_name, pd_img, price ,amount, summoney) select mb_id , cart_idx, pd_idx , pd_category, pd_name, pd_img , price , amount, (price * amount) as summoney from cart where cart_idx = #{cart_idx} and mb_id = #{mb_id}
mapper.select: select pre_id , p.mb_id , p.pd_idx , p.pd_category, p.pd_name , p.pd_img ,p.amount, p.summoney , m.mb_id , m.mb_name from preorder p, member m where m.mb_id = p.mb_id and p.mb_id = #{mb_id} order by pre_id
select count(*) from preorder where mb_id = #{mb_id}
